rl

Class SimpleMarkovDecisionProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.hmm.ModularHiddenMarkovModel
      • rl.SimpleMarkovDecisionProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HiddenMarkovModel, java.io.Serializable, MarkovDecisionProcess, Copyable

    public class SimpleMarkovDecisionProcess
extends ModularHiddenMarkovModel
implements MarkovDecisionProcess
    A markov decision process with rewards unconditional on actions implemented using an input output hidden markov model
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
